descriptions.short50: AI-powered marketing for European SMEs. GDPR-compliant. Results-driven campaigns.
descriptions.medium100: AI Marketing BG delivers intelligent marketing solutions for European businesses. We combine AI automation with proven marketing strategies to drive growth. Fully GDPR-compliant campaigns with transparent reporting and measurable ROI. Part of the Classic Security EOOD portfolio.
descriptions.long250: AI Marketing BG is the bridge between cutting-edge AI technology and effective marketing for European SMEs. Our agency leverages artificial intelligence to optimize campaigns, analyze market trends, and deliver personalized customer experiences at scale. Unlike traditional agencies, we understand both the technical and regulatory landscape of European business. Every campaign is designed with GDPR compliance built-in, ensuring your marketing never compromises customer trust. From SEO and content strategy to paid advertising and marketing automation, our AI-enhanced approach delivers measurable results. Based in Varna, Bulgaria, we serve clients across the EU with competitive pricing and enterprise-grade quality. Whether you're targeting the Bulgarian market or expanding across Europe, AI Marketing BG provides the strategic intelligence and execution power to grow your business.

schema.name: AI Marketing BG
schema.description: AI-Powered Marketing Solutions for European SMEs
